scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Letters, Louis Bromfield to Marian Hall, and one post card, Louis and Mary Bromfield, to Marian Hall; and a picture post card of Louis Bromfield on skiis, n.d.; two photographs of Bromfield.

did.unittitle: Louis Bromfield, Paris, France, to Marian Hall, Northampton, [England] [1927 Mar 24]
did.physdesc: ALS, 2 p. on 2 l. w/ envelope

scopecontent.p: Sends pictures; gives best to the Seldes

did.unittitle: Louis Bromfield, Paris, France, to Marian Hall [ca. 1929 spring]

scopecontent.p: Writes that he is working on a new book; mentions going to visit Mildred in London next month; writes that they are falling completely into French life, mentioning General Sir Reginald and Lady Barnes and other French persons, and discussing their social life in France, including Caux

did.unittitle: Louis Bromfield, Paris, France, to Marian Hall, New York, New York [ca. 1929 spring]
did.physdesc: ALS, 2 p. on 1 l., w/ envelope

scopecontent.p: Expresses gratitude for the collection of records which makes "all the difference to homesick Americans"; mentions Rupe and Chalmers being in Italy, the reviews in the Italian papers of The Strange Case of Annie Spring, and visiting Mildred in London

did.unittitle: Louis and Mary [Appleton Wood] Bromfield to Marian Hall, New York, New York [1933 Jan 22]

scopecontent.p: Writes onboard the M. N. Victoriaprior to landing in Bombay for a ten-month stay in India

did.unittitle: Louis Bromfield, Oise, France, to Marian Hall, New York, New York 1934
did.physdesc: ALS, 4 p. on 2 p. w/ envelope

scopecontent.p: Expresses gratitude for the gift with the touching inscription from Udall and Ballow; mentions Lil[yan]Tashman and his feelings over her suffering and consequent death; refers to his time in New York and coming back to France; mentions receiving a call from Gertrude Stein and Alice B. Toklas.

did.unittitle: Louis Bromfield, Paris, France, to Marian Hall [1938 Apr 8]

scopecontent.p: Expresses regret for missing the gala due to complications concerning the house and workmen; hopes to be at Kitty's gala on Friday night; encloses a check

did.unittitle: Louis Bromfield, Oise, France, to Marian Hall n.y. [ca. Apr 30]
Louis Bromfield, Oise, France, to Marian Hall n.d.
Photograph of Louis Bromfield on Skiis n.d.

scopecontent.p: Inscribed "For Marian from her best boy friend (not including Otis) with much love Louis"
